name: Blade Disciple
description: +75 Attack

name: Deadly Precision
description: +5% Critical Rate.

name: Heart of Glory
description: +5% damage when attacking with full health.

name: Keen Strike
description: +10% critical damage.

name: Shield Breaker
description: +25% damage to targets with a [Shield] buff.

name: Grim Resolve
description: +5% damage when attacking with 50% hp or less.

name: Single Out
description: Increases damage inflicted to targets with less than 40% hp by 8%.

name: Life Drinker
description: Heals by 5% of damage inflicted when attacking with 50% HP or less.

name: Whirlwind of Death
description: Increases speed by 6 for each enemy you have killed, stacks across rounds in a battle, to a maximum of 18 speed.

name: Ruthless Ambush
description: Increases damage inflicted by 8% for the first hit on each enemy.

name: Bring It Down
description: Increases damage inflicted by 6% when attacking targets with higher max hp.

name: Wrath of the Slain
description: increases damage by 5% for each dead ally, up to 10%.

name: Cycle of Violence
description: Has a 30% chance of decreasing the cooldown of a random skill by 1 turn if the damage inflicted by a skill exceeds 30% of the target's max HP. Occurs once per turn.

name: Opportunist
description: Increases damage inflicted to targets with [Stun], [Sleep], or [Freeze] debuffs by 12%.

name: Methodical
description: Increases the damage inflicted by this Champion's default Skill by 2% each time it is used during battle. Stacks across each round in a battle, up to 10%.

name: Kill Streak
description: Increases damage inflicted by 6% in arena and 3% in all other locations for each enemy killed by this Champion in Battle. Stacks across each round, up to 12%.

name: Blood Shield
description: Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 1 turn when this Champion kills an enemy. The value of the [Shield] is equal to 15% of this Champion's MAX HP. Occurs once per turn.

name: Stoked to Fury
description: Increases damage inflicted by 4% for each debuff on this Champion. Stacks up to 12%.

name: Warmaster
description: Has a 60% chance of inflicting bonus damage when attacking. Bonus damage is equal to 10% of the target Champion's MAX HP or 4% of the target's MAX HP when attacking Bosses. Bonus damage can only occur once per Skill and does not count as an extra hit.Damage based on: [Enemy MAX HP].

name: Helmsmasher
description: Has a 50% chance to ignore 25% of your targets DEF. For skills that ignore DEF, this 15% is in addition to the amount ignored by the Skill.

name: Giant Slayer
description: Has a 30% chance of inflicting bonus damage when attacking. Bonus Damage is equal to 5% of the target's MAX HP or 2% of the Boss' MAX HP. Bonus damage can occur on each hit of a Skill, but does not counter as an extra hit. Damage based on: [Enemy Max HP].

name: Flawless Execution
description: Critical Damage +20%.

name: Tough Skin
description: Defense + 75.

name: Defiant
description: Resistance + 10.

name: Blastproof
description: Decreases damage from AoE attacks by 5%.

name: Rejuvenation
description: Increases the amount of healing and the value of [Shield] buffs this Champion receives by 5%.

name: Mighty Endurance
description: Decreases the damage received by 10% if this Champion has [Stun], [Sleep], or [Freeze] debuffs.

name: Improved Parry
description: Decreases damage received by this Champion by 8% when this Champion is hit with a critical hit.

name: Shadow Heal
description: Heals this Champion by 6% of their MAX HP each time an enemy is healed. Occurs once per turn.

name: Resurgent
description: Has a 50% chance to remove 1 random debuff from this Champion when they lose 25% of their MAX HP or more from a single enemy skill.

name: Bloodthirst
description: Heals this Champion by 10% of their max HP when they kill an enemy target. Cooldown: 1 turn.

name: Wisdom of Battle
description: Has a 30% chance of placing a [Block Debuffs] buff on this Champion for 1 turn when [Stun], [Sleep] or [Freeze] debuffs expire on this Champion.

name: Solidarity
description: Increases Ally Resist by 5 for each buff placed on them by this Champion.

name: Delay Death
description: Reduces the damage this Champion receives from a specific enemy by 0.75% with each hit taken from that enemy, Damage reduction stacks up to 6% for each enemy.

name: Harvest Despair
description: Has a 60% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 1 turn when placing [Stun], [Sleep], or [Freeze] debuffs.

name: Stubbornness
description: Increases RESIST by 10 for each debuff on this champion, Stacks up to 30.

name: Selfless Defender
description: Decreases the damage an ally received from the first enemy hit in each round by 20%. This Champion will receive that damage instead.

name: Cycle of Revenge
description: Has a 50% chance of increasing the Turn Meter by 15% when an ally is attacked with a critical hit. Will only increase the Turn Meter once if an ally receives multiple critical hits from a single skill.

name: Retribution
description: Has a 50% chance to counterattack when this Champion loses 25% of their MAX HP or more from a single enemy skill.

name: Deterrence
description: Has a 20% chance to counterattack an enemy when they apply a [Stun], [Sleep], or [Freeze] debuff on an ally.

name: Bulwark
description: Decreases the damage all allies receive by 5%. This Champion will receive that damage instead.

name: Fearsome Presence
description: Increases the chance of placing a [Stun], [Sleep], [Freeze] or [Provoke] debuff from Skills or Artifacts by 5%.

name: Unshakeable
description: Resist +50.

name: Steadfast
description: Max HP +810.

name: Pinpoint Accuracy
description: Acc + 10.

name: Lay on Hands
description: Increases the value of heals this Champion casts by 5%.

name: Shieldbearer
description: Increases the value of [Shield] buffs this Champion casts by 5%.

name: Exalt in Death
description: Heals this Champion by 10% of their Max HP the first time an enemy is killed in each round.

name: Charged Focus
description: Increases ACC by 20 when this Champion has no skills on Cooldown.

name: Healing Savior
description: Increases the amount of healing and the value of [Shield] buffs placed by this Champion by 10% if the target ally has 40% HP or less.

name: Rapid Response
description: Has a 30% chance of increasing the Turn Meter by 10% when a buff cast by this Champion is removed or expires.

name: Swarm Smiter
description: Increases Acc by 4 for each enemy alive. Stacks up to 16.

name: Arcane Celerity
description: Has a 30% chance of increasing the Turn Meter by 10% when a debuff cast by this Champion is removed or expires.

name: Merciful Aid
description: Increases the amount of healing and the value of [Shield] buffs placed by this Champion by 15% if the target ally has [Stun], [Sleep], or [Freeze] debuffs.

name: Cycle of Magic
description: Has a 5% chance of decreasing the cooldown of a random skill by 1 turn at the start of every turn.

name: Lore of Steel
description: Increases the Set Bonuses of Basic Artifact Sets by 15%. This increase is multiplicative, not additive.

name: Evil Eye
description: Decreases the target's Turn Meter when this Champion hits target for the first time with the default skill. Decreases the Turn Meter by 20% with single-target Skills and by 5% with AoE Skills.

name: Lasting Gifts
description: has a 30% chance to extend the duration of any buff cast by this Champion by 1 turn. It will not extend [Block Damage], [Unkillable] or [Revive on Death] buffs.

name: Spirit Haste
description: Increases SPD by 8 for each dead ally. Stacks up to 24.

name: Sniper
description: Increases the chances of placing any debuff from Skills or Artifacts by 5%. It will not increase the chances of placing [Stun], [Sleep], [Freeze] or [Provoke] debuffs.

name: Master Hexer
description: Has a 30% chance to extend the duration of any debuff cast by this Champion by 1 turn. It will not extend [Stun], [Sleep], [Freeze] or [Provoke] debuffs.

name: Elixir of Life
description: Max HP + 3000.

name: Timely Intervention
description: Increases this Champions' Turn Meter by 20% whenever an ally hero drops below 25% HP.

name: Oppressor
description: Increases the Turn Meter fill rate by 2.5% for each active debuff cast by the Champion. Stacks up to 10%.

name: Eagle Eye
description: Acc + 50.
